snippet: Brendan Ryan, one of the best defensive shortstops in the game, realizes he will be used when Derek Jeter needs a day off or is used as the designated hitter.
lead_paragraph: Brendan Ryan, one of the best defensive shortstops in the game, realizes he will be used when Derek Jeter needs a day off or is used as the designated hitter.

headline.main: In Ryan, Yankees Have Understudy Who Knows His Role
headline.print_headline: In Ryan, Yankees Have Understudy Who Knows His Role
